title: Sapling Code
author: Mad Marv
pages: Plant a sapling and it whispers to you. Crack its code and it reveals riches beyond dreams. First, water with honeydew under noon sun.
Its leaves align to form ancient symbols. If decoded correctly, portals of color emerge from the ground's edge.
Those who fail to crack the code must pay homage by building a towering tribute made of pumpkin patch dreams.
